meta.title: How to Upgrade to React 18
meta.author: Rick Hanlon
meta.description: As we shared in the release post, React 18 introduces features powered by our new concurrent renderer, with a gradual adoption strategy for existing applications. In this post, we will guide you through the steps for upgrading to React 18.
